bibl.title: A Hoard from Elephantine Island.
bibl.note: An apparent hoard of 13 Ptolemaic bronze coins (in the hands of a local dealer, 1993/94). They were said to have been found together within the area of the so-called cemetery of the Sacred Rams.
bibl.seg: JENKINS Michael R., A Hoard from Elephantine Island.
An apparent hoard of 13 Ptolemaic bronze coins (in the hands of a local dealer, 1993/94). They were said to have been found together within the area of the so-called cemetery of the Sacred Rams.
